channel.title: Random Questions
channel.description:
1. How do i get rid of the random floating skulls and things that are in varrock and catherby and other places? 2. How do i add mining so that it works when i click the rocks? 3. How do i add the woodcutting emote so that it does it while woodcutting instead of just standing there?
I might ask more questions later. Please number your answer so i am sure which one you are answering. Thank you.

item.title: Random Questions
item.dc:creator: @senorlemon senorlemon
item.description:
@senorlemon wrote:

well the skulls may be representing fences but there are also these random blue and gray things all over near things like varrock fountain and things. is it possible to erase them?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2009, 11:26:42 am[/size][hr]i am now wondering if it is possible to add the models for the dagannoth kings so that they arent just pink firemaking skillcapes and also if its possible to add the model for special capes like dangerous cape which gives you wings so that the inv. look isnt a half of a blue square. also when i spawn sara sword it makes it a null. how do i fix this. do i have to make custom looks myself because that would take a looooonnnngggg time would it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2009, 11:29:17 am[/size][hr]

Read full topic
